comment._content:
actually it probably was "La Quiaca"

I'm from Argentina and that's the name of the north-western region of the country

comment.author: 35310696@N04
comment._content: Thank you. I changed the caption.

comment.author: 47226215@N00
comment._content:
Actually, "La Quiaca" is not the name of the whole north-western region, but that of a town on the argentinian-bolivian boundary (as the caption correctly states).
And the name of the hotel is painted on the front wall of it: "Plaza".
